name: Orange Burst
title: Dark Coherence: Axis of Certainty
altText:
A near-black luminous field carries a sparse set of geometric shards, arranged with strong, almost ritual symmetry.
The forms overlap without fully merging—semi-permeable edges where overlaps accumulate—while visible fracture and purposeful misalignment keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a prominent flow-field of vectors that bends and re-bends like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
6 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: low-light coherence; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.

name: Purple Reign
title: Soft-Boundary Fractured Recursive Field
altText:
A near-black luminous field carries densely layered, recursive geometry, arranged with clear symmetry with deliberate slippage.
The forms overlap without fully merging—semi-permeable edges where overlaps accumulate—while visible fracture and purposeful misalignment keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a soft vector field suggesting prediction and revision like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
10 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: bright, glassy radiance; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.
